GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles with number of comments for each

queries.name: topic
queries.description: Optional. Filters the articles by the provided topic name.

queries.name: sort_by
queries.description: Optional. Sorts the articles by any valid article column. Defaults to 'created_at'.

queries.name: order
queries.description: Optional. Sets the sorting order. Can be 'asc' for ascending or 'desc' for descending. Defaults to 'desc'.

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves an article object for article_id parameter

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: adds to comments table and serves and respones with the posted comment object

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves an array of comment objects for article_id parameter

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves an article object for article_id and updates the vote

DELETE /api/comments/:comment_id.description: deletes a comment for comment_id parameter

GET /api/users.description: serves an array of all user objects

GET /api/users/:username.description: serves a user object for username parameter

PATCH /api/comments/:comment_id.description: serves a comment object for comment_id and updates the vote
